timeline_exists: With this function you can check and see whether a time line exists (returns true) or not (returns false). This is particularly useful when creating Timelines dynamically using the timeline_add() function, but you should note that if you search for an uninitialised variable (that would otherwise be assigned to a time line's index) an error will be thrown.
The index of the time line to check for.
The above code checks to see if a time line exists and is indexed in the global variable "tl" and if so it then deletes that time line.
